recommendations: Ayushi Tandon “I had a pleasure working with Umang in Bitwise. He demonstrated a positive attitude towards the accomplishment. Umang is easily adjustable to a given situation. His ability to go out of his way to help others has made him stand out. It was an enriching experience working with him. I highly recommend Umang if you are looking for the best data analyst.”

Vivek Singh “I have worked with Umang in bitwise and during the tenure, I found him very focussed and dedicated to his work. He has been an integral part of the team and has always looked forward to take on the challenges and stride forward. He is a highly motivated person and also technically skilled. He has great working experience in data analytics with an expertise in Tableau, SQL, Linux.”
projects: [{"title":"IPL Data Analysis ","start_date":"Feb 2018","end_date":"Apr 2018","description":"Project: To analyze the Indian Premier League Cricket matches between 2008 and 2016 and predict the top 4 teams for 2018 version of IPL.Data Source: www.kaggle.com/manasgarg/iplTools & Technologies Used: Hadoop, R programming, Excel, MySql and Tableau"},{"title":"Resilient Change Tracking","start_date":"Aug 2017","end_date":"Mar 2018","description":"Project: A library which works on RCT (Incremental backup technology) and seamlessly integrates with any backup application and provides the changed blocks since the last backup so as to only backup those blocks and automate the whole process.Tools & Technologies Used: C, C++, PowerShell scripting, Visual Studio and Win32 API"},{},{},{"title":"Result Analysis","start_date":"Oct 2016","end_date":"Jan 2017","description":"Project: A website where engineering students from the University of Pune can view their results interactively and can get an insight into their academic profile.Tools & Technologies Used: PHP, MySql, HTML and CSS"},{},{},{}]
